mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveClassInformationList */ A.CLS_ID AS "classID" , A.DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , B.DEPT_NM AS "departmentName" , A.CLS_NM AS "className" , A.CLS_DESC AS "classDesc" , C_YEAR AS "year" , C_TIME AS "time" , GENR AS "generation" , SEMESTER AS "semester" , A.STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A JOIN FRST.DEPT_INFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND B.STCD <> '09' WHERE (CLS_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKeyword}, '') || '%' OR CLS_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKeyword}, '') || '%') AND ('' = COALESCE(#{departmentID}, '') OR A.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}) ORDER BY A.LAST_CHNG_DT DESC , A.LAST_CHNG_TIME DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT /* RetrieveClassInformationTotalCount */ COUNT(*) AS "totalCount" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A JOIN FRST.DEPT_INFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND B.STCD <> '09' WHERE (CLS_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKeyword}, '') || '%' OR CLS_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKeyword}, '') || '%') AND ('' = COALESCE(#{departmentID}, '') OR A.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}) AND A.STCD <> '09'
SELECT /* RetrieveLastClassID */ CLS_ID AS "classID" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A ORDER BY CLS_ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* RetrieveClassInformationDetail */ A.CLS_ID AS "classID" , A.DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , A.CLS_NM AS "className" , A.CLS_DESC AS "classDesc" , A.STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A WHERE A.CLS_ID = #{classID} AND A.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterClassInformation */ INTO FRST.CLS_INFO ( CLS_ID , DEPT_ID , CLS_NM , CLS_DESC , STCD , C_YEAR , GENR , C_TIME , SEMESTER , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{classID} , #{departmentID} , COALESCE(#{className}, '') , COALESCE(#{classDesc}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{cyear}, '') , COALESCE(#{generation}, '') , COALESCE(#{ctime}, '') , COALESCE(#{semester}, 0) , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateClassInformation */ FRST.CLS_INFO SET DEPT_ID = COALESCE(#{departmentID}, DEPT_ID) , CLS_NM = COALESCE(#{className}, CLS_NM) , CLS_DESC = COALESCE(#{classDesc}, CLS_DESC) , C_YEAR = COALESCE(#{cyear}, C_YEAR) , GENR = COALESCE(#{generation}, GENR) , C_TIME = COALESCE(#{ctime}, C_TIME) , SEMESTER = COALESCE(#{semester}, SEMESTER) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE CLS_ID = #{classID} AND DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}
